title: Make me Cum Again
description: Mike Carey loves only two things in the world. Architecture and sex. When an accident happens to him, he wakes up in a hospital to find his career on the line. Worst, he found himself impotent.Desperate to get back what he had, he'll try to do everything. He even enlisted the help of Dr. Young and together they will try an unconventional therapy that Mike hopes will restore him back.Will it work?
author: R. Philips
